name: Linear
description:
Get through obstacles. Die, Die Again. 

You are C.R.O.D.   A robot built to explore a mysterious wall located in the center of a field.

That was the story I wrote in 2018.

Linear is my first attempt to make a video game. One of my longest projects, I worked on and off on this project for 4 years. I started this as a for fun thing.  Something I would finish in a month, like my earlier projects.

Boy, I was wrong.

I was so ambitious at the time that it's a miracle that I'm even able to finish it.

I'm just going to release this and never touch this game again.

I also side released the fugly 2017 prototype. comes with all that unreleased lore.

ARROWS to move

SPACE to jump

R to restart level

ESC to pause

6 sends you to the shadow realm.  Don't press 6

BACKSPACE boots you back to the main-menu. No warning at all. Just giving you a heads-up.

the 2017 version has a next level button (D) that goes to the next level.

It has partial controller support but keyboard is recommended.

Also Flashing lights warning past the green square part.  Sorry.
